hero_head: Hello, my name is Ruslan and I am
hero_subtitle: Development of adaptive, cross-browser, and cross-platform web applications with readable, semantic, and clean code based on your PSD or Figma design layout.
portfolio_subtitle: Here I would like to introduce a few of my projects that I have been working on in recent years.
summary_text_1: Frontend Developer with commercial experience since 2015. Engaged in developing interfaces for marketing agencies, freelance projects, and client orders by recommendation. Started my career with HTML5/CSS3/jQuery layout, gradually mastering modern tools and technologies, including the SASS CSS preprocessor, PHP, ES6 JavaScript syntax, setting up goals in Google Analytics and Yandex.Metrica, as well as developing quizzes and interactive sections using JavaScript.
summary_text_2: I have experience working with WordPress CMS: implementing layouts, creating themes, customizing with Advanced Custom Fields (ACF), creating Custom Post Types and taxonomies, and integrating WooCommerce.
summary_text_3: Worked both independently and as part of a team, coordinating with project managers and designers to ensure layouts met requirements. After completing the layout, I handed it over to backend developers for further integration.
summary_text_4: In the past year, I completed courses on React, Next.js, Node.js, and MongoDB, actively developing expertise in modern frameworks and tools.
summary_text_5: Currently, I am seeking a company for long-term collaboration and career growth.
my_degree: Master's degree in Mechanical Engineering Technology
my_uni: Mariupol State Technical University of the Azov Region, Mariupol, Ukraine
